ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when that which covered the Lote-tree covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the Lote-tree was covered over with what it was covered over;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (This was) when the lote-tree was covered with that which covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the tree was covered with a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When the lote-tree was being enveloped, by whatever around it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When that covered the lote tree which did cover it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When that which covers covered the lote-tree;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when there covered the Lote-Tree that which covered;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When that which shroudeth did enshroud the lote-tree,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when the lote tree was covered in mystic splendour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When that covered the lote-tree which covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when there covered the Lote Tree what covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, the Lote-tree was shrouded (in mystery unspeakable!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When that covered the lote-tree which did cover it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When there comes to the Lote Tree, that which comes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As there covered the Lotus Tree what covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:16] when there shrouded the Lote-tree that which shrouded [it], of flying creatures and other [beings] (idh, ‘when’, is operated by ra’āhu, ‘he saw him’),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When that which shroudeth did enshroud the lote tree) when the angels enshroud the lote tree; and it is said this means: when the light enshrouds the lote tree; and it is also said that this means: when a canopy of gold enshrouds the lote tree,
